Well now that Rhenquist has kicked the bucket, any guesses as to who Bush will nominate to replace him?

 
 Don't know, but we are screwed.
We're always screwed, it just happens to varying degrees. This is perhaps one of the harsher instances.
My guess, it will either be Thomas, or, more likely, Scalia, since he has the seniority.

Actually, let me a bit more clear, I was wondering who would get appointed to the court to fill Rhenquist's seat. But I'd completly forgotten about the wholeChief Justice part. Good thing you reminded me. :)

We're always screwed, it just happens to varying degrees. This is perhaps one of the harsher instances.
